snippet: Olga Smirnova, a leading soloist with the Bolshoi Ballet, will make her debut as a guest artist with American Ballet Theater in May at the Metropolitan Opera House, the company announced Wednesday.
abstract: Olga Smirnova, a leading soloist with the Bolshoi Ballet, will make her debut as a guest artist with American Ballet Theater in May at the Metropolitan Opera House, the company announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Bolshoi Soloist to Debut as Guest Artist With Ballet Theater
headline.print_headline: Russian Ballerinas Coming to Ballet Theater
